Languages.Language 1: Understands Ignan but can not speak

Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 3 Piercing plus 3 Fire
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Tail, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 3 Bludgeoning plus 3 Fire

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Fire Snake makes 2 attacks, one with its Bite and one with its Tail

Abilities.Ability 1: Heated Body, The Fire Snake's body is extremely hot, causing nearby creatures to take an Average 3 Fire damage while attempting to attack it

Damage Resistances.Damage 1: Bludgeoning, Piercing and Slashing from nonmagical attacks
